Literature.Title: Purification and Characterization of Plantaricin JLA-9: A Novel Bacteriocin against Bacillus spp. Produced by Lactobacillus plantarum JLA-9 from Suan-Tsai, a Traditional Chinese Fermented Cabbage.
Literature.Author: Zhao S, Han J, Bie X, Lu Z, Zhang C, Lv F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus AS1.1846(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus pumilus CMCC 63202(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium CICC 10448(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus coagulans CICC 20138(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 9943(MIC=16µg/ml),Geobacillus stearothermophilus CICC 20139(MIC=32µg/ml),Alicyclobacillus acidoterrestris CICC 10374(MIC=16µg/ml),Paenibacillus polymyxa CGMCC 4314(MIC=16µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile CICC 22951(MIC=32µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens CICC 22949(MIC=32µg/ml),Clostridium sporogenes CICC 10385(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=16µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus CMCC 28000(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens AS1.1802(MIC=16µg/ml),Serratia marcescens CICC 10187(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CICC 21527(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 51005(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A CICC 21501(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi B CICC 21495(MIC=16µg/ml),Shigella flexneri CMCC 51571(MIC=32µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis CMCC 49005(MIC=16µg/ml)
